pageContent: Introduction: The incidence of erectile dysfunction (ED) in men with organ-confined prostate cancer (PCa) submitted to hypofractionated radiotherapy (HRT) has been prospectively evaluated.

metaData.source:
[Urgency after successful treatment of prostate cancer. Prospective study on the influence of treatment modality, morbidity, and epidemiological factors on the quality of life]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21927876/
